body.name: Gaming Headphone Stand PC Accessories - RGB Headset Stand with 2 USB Charger, Cool LED Headphone Holder PC Gaming Accessories Gift for Boys Men Gamers, Computer Game Hardware for Desk
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 52 mins
features: 【Amazing Gaming Atmosphere】The RGB headphone stand has a bright and dazzling lighting effect, creating a cool and enthusiastic gaming atmosphere for boy gamers who love PC games, and it will be the perfect gaming desk accessories for the game room. Ideal gift for sons, boys, men and gamers

【10 RGB Lighting Mode】Xergur gaming headset stand has 10 light effect modes. Include 2 color cycle modes, 1 breathing mode and 7 static modes. The light is evenly distributed, and the color of the base and lamp will shift together as the light effect is switched
【2 USB Ports and 1 USB-C Port】2 USB2.0 ports 1 USB-C port for transferring data to a keyboard, USB stick and mouse or charging your smartphone, ipad, tablet or other smart device

【Touch-control Design & Memory Function】Gaming accessories headset stand has sensitive and convenient touch buttons, you can easily select the light mode and off mode; it has a memory function, so it can remember the color pattern after turning off and does not need to be reset when turning on again

【Universal Compatibility】Headphone stand is plug and play, no driver required. ①The RGB headset stand is compatible with various operating systems, access to a computer or other USB outlet plug to use. ②Access to ordinary USB plug charger, then plug into the plug board for lighting work

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: XERGUR HEADPHONE STAND RGB GAMING ACCESSORIES A PERFECT GIFT FOR PC GAMERS The RGB Gaming Headset Stand would be ideal for cool gaming room decorations and would also make a perfect birthday gift, graduation gift, anniversary gift, Thanksgiving gift, Christmas gift for gamers, boys, boyfriends, husbands, friends. Note: Touch once to switch the light source; long touch for 2-3 seconds to switch off the light source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he said he loves it, he said it is a little bright but not too bright. The colors are nice as well, it holds up his heavy headphones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything works as it should and looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great on the desk
reviews.reviewText: The LEDs are really bright and the stand charges my devices quickly. It makes my space much neater to have this “corral” of sorts.Overall, I’d say it is worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as pictured & lights up my room great! I recommend it to anybody needing a single headset stand. It also works with my iPhone charger as well.. I charge up my phone while I play my game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for gamers!
reviews.reviewText: I got this stand for my son, who is a professional gamer, so it’s more than just a hobby for him. He takes all of his gaming equipment very seriously. And he loves this stand for his gaming headphones!! It is both functional and eye catching!He had just gotten a new desktop computer and he was so excited because he says the lights on his computer match the lights on the new stand. He also appreciates having the charging ports for his phone, an added benefit. This would make such a great gift for any gamer, or anyone with headphones looking to add a little light and color to their room!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lights up just fine but too light to hold headset. I have a Turtle Beach headset and it topples over constantly when trying to put the headset on the headset rest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's cheap at $18
reviews.reviewText: I like these simpler headphone stands that doesn't rotate since mine is wired. The RGB color is nice, covers half the tube. The base is nice and has two USB ports to charge your device, but I will refrain from using them as they might have interference from the stand itself (it's better to just charge directly from your PC than from another medium like this stand). The quality is OK, expected of this range. Overall good purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and colorful way to store headset
reviews.reviewText: My boys love this headset stand for its bright rainbow colors...I love it because it means their headphones aren't strewn across the floor or in random places in their playroom. Anything that helps my kids remember to put things where they properly belong is a winner in my book!

The media could not be loaded. Cuando lo compre sabía que prendía con luces de colores, pero no sabía cuántos colores y las combinaciones que puedes hacer con tu equipo. El dispositivo cuenta con 2 entradas de USB y una de 3.5 mm. La verdad es que me encantó, es fácil de armar y de noche se ve genial !!

El soporte cumple bastante bien su función, los colores se ven muy bien y tiene 2 puertos USB con los que cargo mis controles de play Station, el material no es de la más alta calidad pero no siente para nada endeble, cumple con las 3B.
